quote: Do not always run away from the darkness! Remember the beautiful lakes which are hidden inside the dark caves! In the least expected places, there exist the most beautiful treasures!
author: Mehmet Murat Ildan

quote: It doesn't matter if a cave has been in darkness for 10,000 years or half an hour, once you light a match it is illuminated.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: Welcome out of the cave, my friend. It's a bit colder out here, but the stars are just beautiful.
author: Plato

quote: The cave you fear to enter holds the treasure you seek.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: In the midst of darkness, light persists.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Fear is only as deep as the mind allows.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: To shine your brightest light is to be who you truly are.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: You don’t have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: There is a crack in everything, that’s how the light gets in.
author: Leonard Cohen

quote: We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light.
author: Plato

quote: Never forget where you came from. That's what I think when I walk into a cave.
author: Demetri Martin
